languages.text: "Я... больше так не могу, Гелона... не могу! Я верно служил своему господину, как отец служил до меня, как служил отец моего отца. Но так не может больше продолжаться! Нет. Нет... Я устал. Хоронить трупы убийц и предателей Империума — правое дело. Но теперь мне приходится скрывать смерти невинных юношей и дев. Почти детей! Будь проклят тот день, когда губернатор стал во главе сего мира. Я... я прерву этот проклятый круг. Обещаю тебе! Сегодня ночью я выберусь из поместья, и мы вместе отправимся к Говорящим-со-Звездами. Они передадут служителям Бога-Императора о ереси, что угнездилась в этих стенах. За нами вернутся. Нас спасут! Ты только дождись меня, Гелона. Только дождись..."

traits.locale_text: "Я... больше так не могу, Гелона... не могу! Я верно служил своему господину, как отец служил до меня, как служил отец моего отца. Но так не может больше продолжаться! Нет. Нет... Я устал. Хоронить трупы убийц и предателей Империума — правое дело. Но теперь мне приходится скрывать смерти невинных юношей и дев. Почти детей! Будь проклят тот день, когда губернатор стал во главе сего мира. Я... я прерву этот проклятый круг. Обещаю тебе! Сегодня ночью я выберусь из поместья, и мы вместе отправимся к Говорящим-со-Звездами. Они передатут служителям Бога-Императора о ереси, что угнездилась в этих стенах. За нами вернутся. Нас спасут! Ты только дождись меня, Гелона. Только дождись..."

languages.text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the noble thing to do, but now I must conceal the deaths of these innocent young men and women. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! Tonight, I will flee the estate and together we will journey to the Starspeakers. They will warn the servants of the God-Emperor about the heresy lurking in these walls. They will return for us. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."
languages.original_text: "Я... больше так не могу, Гелона... не могу! Я верно служил своему господину, как отец служил до меня, как служил отец моего отца. Но так не может больше продолжаться! Нет. traits.locale_text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the noble thing to do, but now I must conceal the deaths of these innocent young men and women. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

"I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, like did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of the murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the right thing to do, but now I am hiding the deaths of the innocent young lads and fair maidens. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! Tonight I will flee the estate and together we will journey to the Ones Who Talk to the Stars. They will warn the servants of the God-Emperor about the heresy lurking in these walls. They will return for us. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

"I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

languages.text: 「もう… もう僕には無理だ、ヘロナ… 無理だ！ 父や祖父のように主に忠実に尽くしてきたけど、これ以上は無理だ！ いや。違う… 僕は疲れてしまった。殺人者や帝国の裏切り者の死体を埋めるのは高貴なことかもしれないが、今度は無実の若い男や女の死体を隠さなければならないなんて。彼らはまだ子供だ！総督がこの惑星の支配者に任命された日が恨めしい。僕は… この負の連鎖を断ち切る。絶対にだ！ 今晩、僕は邸宅から逃げて、一緒にスタースピーカーたちのところへ出発しよう。彼らなら神帝陛下の従者たちに、ここで跋扈している異端について警告してくれる。僕たちのために戻ってきてくれる。僕たちを救ってくれるよ！ 待っていてくれ、ヘロナ。必ず戻るから…」
languages.original_text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the noble thing to do, but now I must conceal the deaths of these innocent young men and women. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! Tonight, I will flee the estate and together we will journey to the Starspeakers. They will warn the servants of the God-Emperor about the heresy lurking in these walls. They will return for us. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

languages.text: «No... puedo seguir así, Helona... ¡No puedo! Serví al amo fielmente, como lo hizo mi padre y su padre antes que él. ¡Pero no podemos continuar así! No. No... Estoy cansado. Deshacerse de los cadáveres de asesinos y traidores al Imperium es lo correcto, pero ahora me piden que oculte las muertes de hombres y mujeres inocentes. ¡Son casi niños! Maldigo el día en que el gobernador se convirtió en señor de este mundo. Yo... romperé este círculo vicioso. ¡Lo prometo! Juntos huiremos de la residencia y viajaremos a los portavoces estelares. Ellos avisarán a los sirvientes del Dios Emperador sobre la herejía que habita en estas paredes. Volverán a por nosotros. ¡Nos salvarán! Espérame, Helona. Espera mi regreso...».
languages.original_text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the noble thing to do, but now I must conceal the deaths of these innocent young men and women. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! Tonight, I will flee the estate and together we will journey to the Starspeakers. They will warn the servants of the God-Emperor about the heresy lurking in these walls. They will return for us. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

Ellos avisarán a los sirvientes del Dios Emperador sobre la herejía que habita en estas paredes. Volverán a por nosotros. ¡Nos salvarán! Espérame, Helona. Espera mi regreso...».

languages.text: “赫罗娜，我不能……决不能……再这样下去了！我的父亲、我的祖父，我们世代忠诚地侍奉主人，但决不能再这样下去了！不。不可以……我已经累了。处理谋杀犯和帝国叛徒的尸体是我的荣幸，可现在我却要秘密埋葬这些无辜的年轻人，他们还只是孩子啊！从总督继位的那一天起，这个世界就已经遭到了诅咒。我……我要打破这个邪恶的轮回。我发誓！今晚我就要逃离庄园，我们一起去寻找星语者。他们会把高墙之内滋生的异端报告给神皇的仆人。他们会来找我们的，他们会来把我们救走！等着我，赫罗娜，一定要等我回来……”
languages.original_text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the noble thing to do, but now I must conceal the deaths of these innocent young men and women. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! Tonight, I will flee the estate and together we will journey to the Starspeakers. They will warn the servants of the God-Emperor about the heresy lurking in these walls. They will return for us. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

languages.text: « Je... Je ne peux pas continuer comme ça, Helona... Je n'en peux plus ! J'ai servi mon maître avec loyauté, comme mon père et son père avant cela, mais je ne peux pas continuer ! Non. Non... Je suis épuisé. Ensevelir le corps des assassins et des traîtres à l'Imperium est une tâche noble, mais maintenant, je ne fais rien d'autre que dissimuler la mort de ces jeunes hommes et femmes innocents. Ils sortaient à peine de l'enfance ! Maudit soit le jour où le gouverneur a commencé à diriger ce monde. Je... Je vais briser ce cercle vicieux. Je le jure ! Ce soir, je vais m'enfuir de la propriété et nous irons à la rencontre des Starspeaker. Ils préviendront les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu de l'hérésie qui sévit dans ces murs. Ils reviendront nous chercher. Ils nous sauveront ! Attends-moi, Helona. Je serai vite de retour... »
languages.original_text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired. To bury the corpses of murderers and traitors to the Imperium is the noble thing to do, but now I must conceal the deaths of these innocent young men and women. They are almost children! Cursed be the day when the governor became the ruler of this world. I... I will break this vicious circle. This I promise! Tonight, I will flee the estate and together we will journey to the Starspeakers. They will warn the servants of the God-Emperor about the heresy lurking in these walls. They will return for us. They will save us! Just wait for me, Helona. Just wait until I return..."

Non. Non... Je suis épuisé. Ensevelir le corps des assassins et des traîtres à l'Imperium est une tâche noble, mais maintenant, je ne fais rien d'autre que dissimuler la mort de ces jeunes hommes et femmes innocents. Ils sortaient à peine de l'enfance ! Maudit soit le jour où le gouverneur a commencé à diriger ce monde. Je... Je vais briser ce cercle vicieux. Je le jure ! Ce soir, je vais m'enfuir de la propriété et nous irons à la rencontre des Starspeaker. Ils préviendront les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu de l'hérésie qui sévit dans ces murs. Ils reviendront nous chercher. Ils nous sauveront ! Attends-moi, Helona. Je serai vite de retour... »

languages.text: "Ich ... kann so nicht weitermachen, Helona ... Ich kann einfach nicht! Ich habe meinem Meister treu gedient, genau wie mein Vater und sein Vater zuvor. Doch es kann nicht so weitergehen! Nein. Nein ... Ich bin müde. Die Leichen von Mördern und Verrätern am Imperium zu begraben, ist edel und richtig, doch nun muss ich den Tod dieser unschuldigen jungen Männer und Frauen vertuschen. Sie sind fast noch Kinder! Verflucht sei der Tag, als der Gouverneur zum Herrscher über diese Welt geworden ist. Ich ... ich werde diesen Teufelskreis durchbrechen. Das gelobe ich! Heute werde ich vom Anwesen fliehen, und gemeinsam werden wir zu den Sternensprechern reisen. Sie werden die Diener des Gottimperators warnen, welche Ketzerei in diesen Wänden lauert. Sie werden zurückkommen und uns holen. Sie werden uns retten! Wartet einfach auf mich, Helona. Wartet einfach auf meine Rückkehr ..."
languages.original_text: "I... cannot go on like this, Helona... I cannot! I served my master loyally, as did my father and his father before that. But this cannot continue! No. No... I am tired.
